review_data.title: Best Indian Restaurant in Zurich
review_data.content: Good Indian food is pretty hard to come in general across Switzerland, Zurich has many many many average restaurants, Namaste isn't one of them. Tasty dishes that pack a punch, and can be tailored to your liking, friendly service and more than reasonable prices for...More

review_data.title: Frustrierend!!
review_data.content: Das Restaurant hat 20 Minuten vor der eigentlichen Lieferung die Bestellung storniert. Da hatten wir bereits 1h gewartet..... schliesst doch...More

review_data.title: Perfect Indian Takeout!
review_data.content: Went to Namaste to take out dinner tonight. Got a starter and main dish, was ca. 30 Fr. (10% off atm). It was delicious and the portion was very generous! Really fair price, everything was perfect!

review_data.title: Sehr gut!
review_data.content: Wir sind jedesmal sehr zufrieden. Vor allem jetzt während der Corona-Zeit eine gute Abwechslung. Take Away funktioniert super! Bestellen und...More

review_data.title: Absoluter Hammer!
review_data.content: War diese Woche 3 Mal dort und war jedes Mal unglaublich lecker!! Das Tikka Masala Paneer zb. Ist meega gut!!!...More

review_data.title: Authentic Indian restaurant
review_data.content: We had been there twice for dinner and the food was really delicious! The portions are quiet big and served in cute copper pots. The staff is friendly and very helpful. They speak English and German very well. The restaurant is located in the new...More

review_data.title: Super gut gegessen!
review_data.content: Wir waren zum Abend essen das erste Mal hier und völlig begeistert! Alle Speisen waren einwandfrei und auch nicht schärfer...More

review_data.title: Authentic & delicious
review_data.content: We loved it here. Nice location with outside seating, nice decoration, friendly staff... This place has a lot to mention in it's favour. But the best is the food. Delicious, creamy, rich, sensational dishes. The samosas are great, the Korma a dish from heaven. Only...More

review_data.title: Excellent, homy india food
review_data.content: This Indian restaurant is located behind Max-Bill Platz in Oerlikon, on a car-free square. You need to know it is there, not easy to find. We ate on the terrace, a mix of vegetarian and meat tandoori dishes. Nothing fancy, but honest and tasty food,...More

review_data.title: love it
review_data.content: The food was really excellent! Tasty and freshly made, and the waiter was friendly and caring. The smoothest Butter Chicken we’ve ever had. The hosts come out from time to time, passing by the tables and enquiring how our stay is.

review_data.title: Best food in Zürich
review_data.content: I been to the restaurant last week with my friends. We had matter paneer and ghost Kashmiri the food was delicious and the service also friendly. Definitely will go back again.

review_data.title: Great place
review_data.content: If you are in Zurich and you like Indian cuisine don’t hesitate to go there. You definitely won’t regret!

review_data.title: Best food in town
review_data.content: Good atmosphere, nice people and real indian tasty food. Highly recommend try Palak Paneer and Butter Chicken. Definitely will go again. :)

review_data.title: Excellent Indian Food
review_data.content: Very delicious and authentic food. Friendly and charming service. Quite and not to busy place. The place is a bit outside but worth the visit!

review_data.title: Authentic Indian Food in Zurich
review_data.content: The Namaste Oerlikon is best in every aspect. Cleanliness, ambience and real Indian authentic taste. The owner Mr. Amit personally cares for the service and food quality.

review_data.title: Great food at quiet location
review_data.content: I was there with 2 colleagues on a monday evening. Not very busy and we sat outside. According to waiter they are open for a couple of months. I had a great korna chicken: not specy, enough good pieces pieces of chicken. Two comments: they...More

review_data.title: Super fine!!!
review_data.content: Ich bin schon zweimal bei Namaste in Zürich Oerlikon gewesen. Das Restaurant ist eingerichtet mit typischen Möbeln, die Kellner sind...More

review_data.title: Excellent food!! Great staff
review_data.content: I really enjoyed the food awesome taste and above all great and friendly staff !! For sure recommended

review_data.title: Happy customer
review_data.content: Really happy that this restaurant has opened in my neighborhood. Top quality food and great service. The lunch buffet is also well worth checking out. 6 stars!

review_data.title: Bestes indisches Restaurant mit hervorragendem Personal
review_data.content: Wir sind schon oft in Indien gereist und auch hierzulande verschiedene Restaurants ausprobiert, aber das Namaste gleich beim Max-Bill-Platz schlägt...More

review_data.title: Super Service & sehr gutes Essen
review_data.content: Das Namaste in Örlikon ist sehr zu empfehlen - super Essen und sehr freundliches und aufmerksames Servicepersonal. Ich komme gerne...More
